mapper.update: update action_recharge_tb set user_code=#{userCode} where code=( select top 1 code from action_recharge_tb with(TABLOCKX) where action_code=#{actionCode} and user_code=0 and type=#{type} order by code )
mapper.select: select top 1 card_code from action_recharge_tb where user_code=#{userCode} and action_code=#{actionCode} order by code desc
